page.title: 02HOUSING IN SANDBACH
page.content: MOST OF THE{HOUSING}IN OUR AREA HAS BEEN BUILT WITHIN THE LAST 10-15 YEARS. THE HOUSES ON THESE NEW ESTATES ARE DETACHED AND SEMI-DETACHED.THE{NEW {HOUSING}CONSISTS OF DEVELOPMENTS ON HASSALL ROAD AND CROWN BANK. THESE HOUSES ARE BUILT IN THE{GEORGIAN {STYLE.}THE PEOPLE LIVING IN THESE NEW HOUSES ARE QUITE SATISFIED WITH THEM ALTHOUGH THEY WOULD PREFER LARGERS ROOMS AND LARGER GARDENS. OLDER HOUSES ARE FOUND ON THE NEWCASTLE ROAD AND IN SANDBACH HEATH.HERE THERE IS A GREATER COMMUNINTY SPIRIT AND FEELING OF BELONGING TO THEIR LOCALITY. A LOT OF THE OLDER TERRACED PROPERTY HAS BEEN RECENTLY RENOVATED.THE PROPERTY AROUND PALMER ROAD IS LARGELY{COUNCIL}OWNED.
